node.title: What dotnet new Could Be
node.description: What the 'dotnet new' CLI command could be if some effort was spent on developing it. I compare it to other templating engines and suggest ideas.

node.title: The Dotnet Watch Tool Revisited
node.description: The dotnet watch tool is a file watcher for dotnet that restarts the application when changes in the source code are detected. You can use dotnet watch in Visual Studio by using the launchSettings.json configuration file.

node.title: A Very Generic .editorconfig File (Updated)
node.description: An .editorconfig file helps define and maintain consistent coding styles between different editors and IDEs for files with different file extensions.

node.title: The Dotnet Watch Tool
node.description: The dotnet watch tool is a file watcher for dotnet that restarts the application when changes in the source code are detected.

node.title: Securing the ASP.NET MVC Web.config
node.description: The web.config file is insecure in the default ASP.NET MVC project template. This post talks you through securing the ASP.NET MVC Web.config file.

node.title: Configuration File Transforms In Visual Studio Should Be Built In
node.description: Configuration File Transforms can be done with the Slow Cheetah Visual Studio extension by Sayed Hashimi. This feature should be built into Visual Studio.
